REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1624 reute r f BC-SHOE-TOWN-<SHU>-MARCH 04-09 0047

TEXT.TITLE: SHOE-TOWN <SHU> MARCH SALES RISE 19 PCT
TEXT.BODY: Shoe-Town Inc said sales for the five weeks ended April four, 1987 rose 19 pct to 16.8 mln dlrs from 14.1 mln dlrs a year ago. It said year-to-date rose 19.4 pct to 36.3 mln dlrs from 30.4 mln dlrs a year ago. Reuter
